text: intent: refactor meta.jsonl->meta.json, fix vote scoring, fix stop hook session resume, add .claude symlink
outcome: v0.3.4-v0.3.6 released; meta.json atomic RMW; vote Beta prior with harmful_weight=2; _find_session_cwd via glob; .claude->.kg symlink in kg start
gotcha: claude --resume needs cwd matching session original project -- hook cwd may differ when kg is sub-project

outcome: v0.3.4–0.3.9 released; /note+/notes skills added to .kg/skills/; kg create cmd; .claude→.kg symlink; vote Beta prior; stop hook session-cwd fix + prompt refined; kg review Votes column; kg-skills node created; PENDING: add cfg.kg_dir property to KGConfig [kg-architecture]
intent: build out kg feature set — /note skill, local embeddings, silent failure fixes, stop hook reliability

outcome: v0.3.8–0.3.11 released; kg create cmd; /note+/notes skills in .kg/skills/; .claude→.kg symlink; stop hook session-cwd fixed (glob scan); fastembed local embeddings documented; embedding silent-fail fixed (stderr warning + vector_server fail-fast); kg status Embeddings row; duplicate cfg.kg_dir gotcha bullet cleaned up
